thread.title: Russian Missile Division in Siberia Will Be Armed With Yars ICBMs in 2017
thread.title_full: Russian Missile Division in Siberia Will Be Armed With Yars ICBMs in 2017

title: Russian Missile Division in Siberia Will Be Armed With Yars ICBMs in 2017

organizations.name: sputnik/ alexandr kryazhev russian strategic missile forces get unique training simulator

text:
Russian Missile Division in Siberia Will Be Armed With Yars ICBMs in 2017 © Sputnik/ Sergey Pyatakov Get short URL 0 43 0 0 Russia's Novosibirsk division of the Strategic Missile Forces will be armed with the Yars intercontinental ballistic missile in 2017, Strategic Missile Forces Commander Col. Gen. Sergei Karakaev said Tuesday. 
NOVOSIBIRSK (Sputnik) — The RS-24 Yars (NATO reporting name SS-27 Mod 2) carries ICBMs with multiple independently targetable nuclear warheads and has a range of 6,800 miles. "The vision will be fully equipped with Yars mobile ground missile systems this year," Karakaev told Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu on an inspection © Sputnik/ Alexandr Kryazhev Russian Strategic Missile Forces Get Unique Training Simulator for Yars ICBM The RS-24 Yars was introduced into service in July 2010. It is an upgraded version of the Topol-M ballistic missile that can be fired both from a mobile launcher and silo.
Russia's Strategic Missile Forces is expected to be equipped with 108 RS-24 missile defense systems by 2020, according to the Russian Defense Ministry. ...
